Articles.Content:
Obligatory "be gentle, these are my first parts" statement.

With that out of the way I bring you a bunch of crap.

Javascript is disabled. View full album

I thought I'd take a less serious approach to part design. These parts were made for my own amusement and hopefully others as well. There are only a few right now, but I'm working on more when I can. Let me know what you think.

The Junk Yard

P.S.: I apparently uploaded my prototype engine with the other parts. For those who a curious, its a 19 nozzle engine. Each nozzle gimbals 20Ã‚Â°, they encircle the piece in 3 stacks of 6 and 1 in the center. The center nozzle points straight down and the others are set +20Ã‚Â° to the one below them as they go up. I hope that's not too confusing.

Edited November 7, 2015 by Kalzuron
